settlements.name: Restek Corporation - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in the June 2023 Restek Corporation data breach

settlements.name: Behavioral Health Resources - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Received notice of the November 2024 Behavioral Health Resources data breach

settlements.name: Dakota Eye Institute - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a Dakota Eye Institute data breach discovered in October 2023

settlements.name: Instinct Pet Foods - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a data breach Instinct Pet Foods discovered in October 2024

settlements.name: $1M Dakota Eye Institute data breach class action settlement
settlements.payout: Up to $1,000 for out-of-pocket losses and up to $5,000 for extraordinary losses or a $45 cash payment
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: City of Hope National Medical Center - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Received notice of a data breach affecting City of Hope National Medical Center that was discovered in October 2023

settlements.name: Orthopedics Rhode Island - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Were sent a notice stating that your personal information was potentially compromised in a September 2024 Orthopedics Rhode Island data breach

settlements.name: Therapeutic Health Services - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was compromised in a February 2024 data breach involving Therapeutic Health Services

settlements.name: $8.5M City of Hope data breach settlement
settlements.payout: Up to $5,000 in documented losses or a $100 alternative cash payment. A $250 statutory payment for California residents
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: RIBridges - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a data breach involving the Rhode Island RIBridges system

settlements.name: $6.3M RIBridges data breach class action settlement
settlements.payout: Up to $5,000 in documented losses or a $100 alternate cash payment
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: Cencora, The Lash Group - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a data breach disclosed in February 2024 that involved Cencora or The Lash Group

settlements.name: Trinity Health Corporation - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a January 2021 data breach affecting Trinity Health Corporation

settlements.name: $40M Cencora data breach class action settlement
settlements.payout: Up to $5,000 in documented losses or a pro rata cash payment
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: Anthem - Mental Health Coverage Denial Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Anthem or Anthem UM Services denied your claim for health insurance coverage for the residential treatment of a mental health condition or substance use disorder between April 29, 2017 and April 30, 2025

settlements.name: $2.72M Limited Run Games VPPA class action settlement
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: $1.57M Alliance Entertainment and DirectToU class action settlement
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: $12.88M Anthem mental health treatment class action settlement
settlements.payout: Reimbursement of out-of-pocket expenses or a $100 nominal payment
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: $30M Google, YouTube kids privacy violations class action settlement
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: Papaya Gaming - Bots Class Action Settlement
settlements.payout: Varies (cash payment or In-Game Cash distribution)
settlements.eligibility: Person in the U.S. who had a Papaya Gaming account and made a deposit in one or more Papaya games between January 1, 2019 and September 5, 2024

settlements.name: Mid America Pet Food - Salmonella Contamination Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Bought certain pet foods produced by Mid America Pet Food between October 31, 2022 and February 29, 2024

settlements.name: $7.15M Joybird, La-Z-Boy deceptive discounts class action settlement
settlements.proof_required: Email address or mailing address associated with purchase
settlements.eligibility: Consumers who, while in the states of California, Oregon or Washington, purchased one or more products on Joybird.com or at a Joybird physical store location, at a sale price, from Dec. 18, 2019, to Oct. 31, 2025

settlements.name: 23andMe - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Were a 23andMe customer between May 1, 2023 and October 1, 2023 and received notice that your personal information was compromised in a data breach

settlements.name: $10M Nelnet data breach class action settlement
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details

settlements.name: $2.23M Alabama Cardiovascular Group data breach class action settlement
settlements.payout: Up to $5,000 for documented losses or a pro rata cash payment, plus two years of credit monitoring
settlements.eligibility: Unknown - check settlement website for details
